nodes.name: Cnt
nodes.function: lambda num_in, cur_cnt, firecounter, phase: ([cur_cnt[0] + 1] if num_in[0] == 9 else [cur_cnt[0]], [cur_cnt[0] + 1] if num_in[0] == 9 else [cur_cnt[0]])
nodes.clashcode:
f_Cnt :: Nibble -> Cntr -> Cntr -> Cntr -> (Cntr, Cntr)
f_Cnt num_in cur_cnt firecounter phase = (res, res)
  where
    res = if num_in == 9 then cur_cnt + 1 else cur_cnt

nodes.name: Pr
nodes.clashcode:
f_Pr :: Cntr -> Cntr -> Nibble
f_Pr firecounter phase = res
  where
    res = resize firecounter

nodes.name: Cr
nodes.clashcode:
f_Cr :: Cntr -> Cntr -> Cntr -> ()
f_Cr cnt_in firecounter phase = res
  where
    res = ()
